title: IThreadFeatureData.BlindDepth
description: Gets or sets the distance from the blind end condition reference of this thread feature, taking into account any offset.
returns: 0.0 < Distance from the blind end condition reference; default is 0.01 m
remarks:
This property is valid only if
IThreadFeatureData::EndCondition
is set to
swThreadEndCondition_e
.swThreadEndCondition_Blind.
Specify either a value or an equation that starts with an equal sign (=).
